text: Need David Brown for Grill'd campaign. Budget around $3,849, looking for 2 x Social media takeover, 3 x 15-second TikTok, 3 x Twitter post, 3 x YouTube short, 1 x Podcast guest. 2 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs December 2025. Usage rights for 10 months. Engagement period: 6 months.
